companies.title: Software Engineer (Assoc. Manager)
tasks: Managed a team of developers to design web applications to process, analyze, and render data, including the development of new features to improve data visualization.
Led senior programmers across multiple work-streams to implement code quality.
Developed a mentorship and training program for junior and entry-level engineers.
Liaised with back-end developers, front-end developers, and quality assurance testers as needed.
Maximized applications efficiency, data quality, scope, operability, and flexibility.
Built responsive websites using semantic HTML5, JavaScript, ReactJS, and CSS which processed, analyzed, and rendered data visually.

companies.title: Software Engineer (Senior Dev.)
tasks: Developed full-stack applications across various platforms using latest industry-adopted technologies and frameworks.
Oversaw debugging activities for applications, web pages, and product features to increase speed and function.
Identified and resolve web development issues reported by clients.
Deployed applications to multiple cloud-based production enviroments, set up and maintain a relational and document database.
Played a key role in the development, improvement, and operation of web-based software.

companies.title: Service Techician
tasks: Provided instructions to customers on the proper usage of their equipment.
